zone: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh City District
circumstances: While parked at Ho Chi Minh-City Airport, the airplane was hijacked by a Vietnamese passenger. All 19 occupants were quickly released and when police forces approached the aircraft, the hijacker set off two grenades that exploded in the cabin. The hijacker was killed and the aircraft was considered as damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: Explosion of two grenades in the cabin after the aircraft has been hijacked.
